name: @saekitominaga/isbn-verify
description: Verify ISBN string format and check digit.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.js -- brotlin compress dist/ISBN.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.js -- terser dist/ISBN.js -o dist/ISBN.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/ISBN.js.map',filename='ISBN.js',includeSources,url='ISBN.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/ISBN.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ISBN.d.ts -- cpy dist/ISBN.d.ts dist --rename=ISBN.min.d.ts
